snippet.title: Declaration of War - The Forever Winter EA Announcement
snippet.description:
Get ready for The Forever Winter on 9/24 and wishlist on Steam today - http://tinyurl.com/mr22dujw 

At release, there will be four thrilling maps and one work-in-progress map, providing endless opportunities for a post-apocalyptic fever dream. With a wide selection of guns to choose from, players can customize their arsenal, which will be necessary as every day alive is a gift. 

Choose from five broken down characters, each with their own baggage and playstyles. Keep an eye out for Gunhead, who is currently in progress, adding even more thrill to the game. 

Don't miss the chance to participate in a Q&A session with the developers, where you can learn more about the game and provide valuable feedback. Watch out for updates coming soon.

Get ready to immerse yourself in the grim world of The Forever Winter and stay tuned for more. We have such wonderful things....to show you.

September 24, 2024.
The only way to weather the storm is to sail directly into it.
Fun Dog out.
